variable.name: BKANKLE
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Ankle Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCARPAL
variable.comment: Carpal Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Carpal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCLAVICLE
variable.comment: Clavical Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Clavical Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKELBOWNOS
variable.comment: Elbow NOS Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Elbow NOS Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKHIP
variable.comment: Hip Fracture is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BKLELBOW
variable.comment: Lower End of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Lower End of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKHAND
variable.comment: Metacarpal Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Metacarpal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKPATELLA
variable.comment: Patella Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Patella Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKPELVIS
variable.comment: Pelvis Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Pelvis Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKLARM
variable.comment: Radius or Ulna Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Radius or Ulna Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCOCCYX
variable.comment: Sacrum or Coccyx Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Sacrum or Coccyx Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKSCAPULA
variable.comment: Scapula Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Scapula Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUPPERLEG
variable.comment: Shaft of Femur Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Shaft of Femur Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKOHUMERUS
variable.description: Fracture of humerus, shaft or unspecified part
variable.comment: Shaft of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Shaft of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKFOOT
variable.comment: Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKTIBIAFIBULA
variable.comment: Tibia or Fibula Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Tibia or Fibula Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKTIBIAL
variable.comment: Tibial Plateau Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Tibial Plateau Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUHUMERUS
variable.comment: Upper End of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Upper End of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUELBOW
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKSPINE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Lumbar Spine Fracture or Thoracic Spine Fracture. Vertebral Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Does not include cervical fractures.

variable.name: HIPFBASE
variable.comment: Not collected on early versions of F123. Value 5 was not collected after WHI closeout.
variable.value: Radiology & discharge summary dx new hip fracture
Radiology dx of hip fx, but not on discharge summary
Discharge, equiv. xray, unequiv. scan/MRI dx hip fx
Hip fracture dx in discharge summary, but no radiology rprt

variable.name: HIPFPATH
variable.comment: Pathologic hip fracture: (Fracture resulting from bone tumors or cysts, Paget's disease, bone or joint prostheses, or surgical manipulation.Osteoporotic fracture is not considered a pathologic fracture.)

variable.name: FRACSIDE
variable.comment: Not collected after WHI closeout.

variable.name: FRACCONF
variable.comment: Not collected after WHI closeout.
variable.value: Non vertebal: Radiology report new fracture
Non vertebal: Radiology report healing fracture
Non vertebal: Non radiology report new/healing fracture
Non vertebal: Init. rad.report equiv., subs report dx fract.
Vertebal: Radiology report based on AP/lateral thoracolumbar
Vertebal: Radiology rprt not based AP/lateral thoracolumbar

variable.name: FRACPATH
variable.comment: Pathologic fracture other than hip: (Fracture resulting from bone tumors or cysts, Paget's disease, bone and joint prostheses, or surgical manipulation. Osteoporotic fracture is not considered a pathologic fracture.) Not collected after WHI closeout. Non vertebral fractures are not counted if they are pathologic.
